item.description:
Let's sample food (appetizers, entrees, and deserts) from some of the areas most loved restaurants in this buffet-style event. Music provided by Bedrock Music, and there will be some auction items. Cash bar.

RESTAURANTS include Legal Seafood, Danversport Yacht Club, Burtons, Century House, Kellys Roast Beef, Maki Sushi Bar, Not Your Average Joes, Stonewood Tavern, Perfectos Cafe, Ipswich Clam Bar, Scosso Ristorante and Martini Bar, Teresas Italian Eatery, Polcaris , Qdoba Mexican Grill, Santoros of Peabody, and LOTS more.

RSVP. Please RSVP only if you ARE going to attend.

TICKETS. $35, at the door or in advance.
IN ADVANCE: You'll avoid waiting on line if you have your ticket in advance. An advantage !! Mail a check to Peabody Rotary, P.O. Box 94, Peabody MA -- but be sure there is enough time for them to mail you your ticket (in your stamped and self-addressed envelope).
AT THE DOOR: Credit cards accepted.

FINDING EACH OTHER. Event starts at 6:00. At 6:15, let's meet in back left corner of ballroom. From 6:15 until 6:30 will be strolling around in leftmost row of buffet tables. Look for me in SILVER TOP (with blond curls). If you give me your cell phone number and you arrive later, I'll e-mail you my cell phone number and you can text me when you arrive so we can find each other.

QUESTIONS. This event is being sponsored by Rotary (the Peabody chapter). Contact Vanessa Silveira at vsilveira@metrocu.org or call her at (978) 326-5801.
item.how_to_find_us: Event is in Ballroom. Meet at 6:15 in back left corner. From 6:15 until 6:30, will be wandering around leftmost row of buffet tables. I'll be wearing a SILVER TOP (and look for blond curls). More details, see below.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Taste of the North Shore
